mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(user_id, user_name, password, create_date) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{password}, now());
INSERT INTO users(user_id, user_name, naver_login, create_date) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{naver_login}, now());
